replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Veronika. When things don't work on Facebook we want to fix them right away, so please report what you're experiencing to us here: http://bit.ly/2vufaWS. -Stephanie

Facebook Hello Facebook. I had secondary account that i'm using for my clients (working as freelance comic artist), then suddenly, that account was  unable to access. I tried my Gmail account  to regain it. I thought the process was successful but it still needed a code from my mobile number. The mobile number that I used for the account was already expired. Now i can't receive a code which is the way to access it. Please help me with this problem. I really need that 2nd account for my everyday living. I have 2 kids and freelancing is my only job. Please help me. We're living in a poor country and access to that account is my way of having financial source to live. Please i'm begging you to help me with this problem. Sincerely, Ariel
